string-array.name: changelog
string-array.item: 🎉 113 new and updated icons! (thanks Redbox3070, Aloxe, Kaiserdragon2, Wari, Joelchrono12, 1qq9qq, Th3Third3ye)
💡 Many fixes for icons not applying.
ℹ️ We currently have over 8000 icon requests, that number is growing very fast. If you\'re curious about creating icons yourself check out our GitHub!
